actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The death dog makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (2d4+2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 CON save or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target is poisoned. Every 24 hours that elapse, the infected creature must repeat the save, reducing its HP maximum by 5 (2d4) on a failure. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest after the disease is cured. The creature dies if the disease reduces its HP maximum to 0.

special_abilities.name: Monstrosity Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The death dog is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.

special_abilities.name: Multiple Heads
special_abilities.desc: The death dog has two heads and is resistant to the blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and unconscious conditions.
